column4: Is the Ubuntu Server Ubuntu channel some sort of alias of this or something (i.e. if I go join that will I see myself?)
<--- had a bit of wine.  May not make sense :)
This one is probably much better
if you are using 8.04 people in here should be able to help

:) No problems right now.  Every time I went to the other one, though, the only answered questions were "Which button do I push in update manager GUI to make updates happen" type questions.  It was rather frustrating when I had actual problems.
